Token.Abstract: NSRRelationship is the class to describes relationships between objects in NSRails.
Returns a relationship to describe a to-many relationship.

Parameter.Name: class
Parameter.Abstract: The class of which your class "has many".

ReturnValue.Abstract: A relationship to describe a to-many relationship.

Token.Abstract: Returns a relationship to describe a to-one relationship.

Parameter.Name: class
Parameter.Abstract: The class of which your class "has one".

ReturnValue.Abstract: A relationship to describe a to-one relationship.

Token.Abstract: Returns a relationship to describe a belongs-to relationship.

Parameter.Name: class
Parameter.Abstract: The class of which your class "belongs to".

ReturnValue.Abstract: A relationship to describe a belongs-to relationship.
